alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 25 at 1:24AM CDT until March 25 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL JACKSON AND CENTRAL DEKALB COUNTIES... At 123 AM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Section, or 7 miles southeast of Scottsboro, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Rainsville and Sylvania around 135 AM CDT. Fort Payne around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Dutton and Langston. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
